keyMappings:
# unmap defaults
unmap W
unmap J
unmap P
unmap X
unmap F
unmap <c-e>
unmap <c-y>
unmap gg
unmap G
unmap zH
unmap zL
unmap yy
unmap gu
unmap gU
unmap gi
unmap <a-f>
unmap yf
unmap gf
unmap gF
unmap O
unmap B
unmap ge
unmap gE
unmap N
unmap H
unmap gt
unmap gT
unmap ^
unmap g0
unmap g$
unmap yt
unmap <a-p>
unmap <a-m>
unmap >>
unmap <<
unmap ?
unmap gs
unmap [[
unmap ]]
unmap `

# right hand mappings
map d scrollPageUp
map t scrollPageDown
map h previousTab
map s nextTab
map . goBack
map n goForward
map r scrollUp
map m scrollDown
map f toggleMuteTab
map p showHelp
map " Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map w Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map q visitPreviousTab
map l Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=b
map ? enterFindMode
map - Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab

# left hand mappings
map b togglePinTab
map y reload hard
map o scrollPageUp
map u reload
map ' enterVisualMode
map c LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map i previousTab
map e scrollPageDown
map a nextTab
map , createTab
map g restoreTab
map x removeTab
map j copyCurrentUrl
map k duplicateTab

# scroll with arrows too
map <up> scrollUp
map <down> scrollDown

# navigate search results
map <right> performFind
map <left> performBackwardsFind

# navigate paginated site
map z goPrevious
map { goNext

map 9 LinkHints.activateMode action=focus
map 7 LinkHints.activateMode action=hover
map 1 moveTabLeft
map 3 moveTabRight
map 2 firstTab
map 0 lastTab
map # scrollFullPageUp
map % scrollFullPageDown

map <space> scrollPageDown
map <backspace> LinkHints.activateMode

map <enter><enter> focusInput
map <enter>. scrollToTop
map <enter>n scrollToBottom
map <enter>c LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab count=99
map <enter>j LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
map <enter>k LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadLik
map <enter>a LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map <enter>, Vomnibar.activateEditUrl

# custom shortcuts
map T createTab https://translate.google.com/
map E createTab https://www.youtube.com/
map A createTab https://leetcode.com/problem-list/top-interview-questions/?sorting=W3sic29ydE9yZGVyIjoiQVNDRU5ESU5HIiwib3JkZXJCeSI6IkRJRkZJQ1VMVFkifV0%3D&page=1
map O createTab https://web.telegram.org/
map I createTab https://excalidraw.com/
map D createTab https://discord.com/channels/630186623555862538/688072482598420560
map H createTab https://radio.garden/listen/systrumsistumssr1/A7e8_nXI
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
#d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
b: https://search.brave.com/search?q=%s Brave
